MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA16 postcode area of Knutsford, affecting properties in Mobberley and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.45PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are carrying out network investigations to repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 8.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.49PM on 3rd January 2021.
